Package ca.phon.script

Class BasicScript

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.phon.script.BasicScript
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IExtendable, PhonScript, Appendable, CharSequence, Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LazyQueryScript
    public class BasicScript
extends Object
implements PhonScript, Cloneable
    Basic phon script in memory. This script stores the script text in an internal StringBuffer. This object is intended to be immutable, however sub-classes may alter the internal script using the provided buffer.
